languages.text: Лидер генетических выродков, заразивших флагман династии, сознался, что презренные мутанты проникли на борт с торговой станции "Обод Эриоха". Гнездо скверны надлежит выжечь.

The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.
languages.original_text: Лидер генетических выродков, заразивших флагман династии, сознался, что презренные мутанты проникли на борт с торговой станции "Обод Эриоха". Гнездо скверны надлежит выжечь.

traits.locale_text: The leader of the genetic anathemas who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

languages.text: Der Anführer der genetischen Abscheulichkeiten, der das Flaggschiff der Dynastie infiziert hatte, hat gestanden, dass die abscheulichen Mutanten die Heriokh's Rim-Handelsstation als Ausgangspunkt für ihre Infiltration missbraucht haben. Dieser Hort der Verderbnis muss ausgebrannt werden.
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

traits.locale_text: Der Anführer der genetischen Abscheulichkeiten, der das Flaggschiff der Dynastie infiziert hatte, hat gestanden, dass die abscheulichen Mutanten die Heriokh's Rim-Handelsstation als Ausgangspunkt für ihre Infiltration missbraucht haben. Dieser Hort der Verderbnis muss ausgebrannt werden.

languages.text: Le chef des aberrations génétiques qui ont infesté le vaisseau amiral de la dynastie a avoué que ces vils mutants se sont servis de la station commerciale de la Faille d'Heriokh comme base d'opérations. Ce repaire de corruption doit être réduit en cendres.
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

traits.locale_text: Le chef des aberrations génétiques qui ont infesté le vaisseau amiral de la dynastie a avoué que ces vils mutants se sont servis de la station commerciale de la Faille d'Heriokh comme base d'opérations. Ce repaire de corruption doit être réduit en cendres.

languages.text: El líder de las aberraciones genéticas que habían infestado la nave insignia de la dinastía ha confesado que los execrables mutantes habían lanzado la infiltración desde la estación comercial de Borde de Heriokh. Este antro de corrupción debe arder.
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

traits.locale_text: El líder de las aberraciones genéticas que habían infestado la nave insignia de la dinastía ha confesado que los execrables mutantes habían lanzado la infiltración desde la estación comercial de Borde de Heriokh. Este antro de corrupción debe arder.

languages.text: 王朝の旗艦にはびこる遺伝的忌まわしきもののリーダーは、卑劣な変異体がヘリオクのリム交易所を利用して潜入したと自供した。腐敗の巣窟は焼却されなければならない。
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

traits.locale_text: 王朝の旗艦にはびこる遺伝的忌まわしきもののリーダーは、卑劣な変異体がヘリオクのリム交易所を利用して潜入したと自供した。腐敗の巣窟は焼却されなければならない。

languages.text: 王朝旗舰那些基因怪物的首领亲口承认，邪恶的变种人通过赫里奥卡之环进行了渗透。必须将那个腐化的巢穴化为灰烬 。
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.

traits.locale_text: 王朝旗舰那些基因怪物的首领亲口承认，邪恶的变种人通过赫里奥卡之环进行了渗透。必须将那个腐化的巢穴化为灰烬 。

languages.text: Hanedanlığın sancak gemisine sızan genetik sapkıların lideri, iğrenç mutantların istilalarına başlamak için Heriokh'un Ağzı ticaret istasyonunu kullandıklarını itiraf etti. Bu yozlaşmışlık ini kül edilmeli.
languages.original_text: The leader of the genetic aberrations who infested the dynasty's flagship has confessed that the despicable mutants had used the Heriokh's Rim trading station to launch their infiltration. That lair of corruption must be incinerated.
